menu.title: Object Remind God's Word
menu.description: Match biblical objects with their names and scripture references in this memory challenge game!

howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.step1: The game generates 5 Biblical triples, each containing an image, object name, and Bible chapter reference
howToPlay.step2: These 15 elements are randomly placed in a 4x4 grid (with one hint card)
howToPlay.step3: Flip cards to reveal their contents and match 3 cards that form a complete triple
howToPlay.step4: Complete all 5 triples as fast as you can!

scoring.title: Scoring
scoring.description: Your score = max(0, 200 - seconds). The faster you complete, the higher your score!

error.title: Something went wrong
error.loadFailed: Failed to generate the game. Please try again.

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.step1: Click cards to flip them over
instructions.step3: You can flip up to 3 cards at once

result.title: Congratulations!
result.message: You've successfully matched all biblical objects!
